snippet: A group of Democrats have challenged Gov. Chris Christie’s decision to hold a special election in October, instead of just adding the race to the November ballot.
abstract: New Jersey State Supreme Court will review Gov Chris Christie’s decision to hold special election for Senate seat in mid-October, three weeks before the election when he is up for a second term.
lead_paragraph: A group of Democrats have challenged Gov. Chris Christie’s decision to hold a special election in October, instead of just adding the race to the November ballot.

headline.main: Court Weighs Date of New Jersey Senate Election
headline.print_headline: Court Weighs Date Of Senate Election
